### **TASK-115: Quick Actions Command Palette** (P1)
**Assigned:** Forge-1 | **Due:** Feb 22 | **Effort:** 6 hours

Add Cmd+K command palette for instant navigation across Mission Control. Search pages, agents, tasks, leads. Quick actions like "Create task" or "Find lead". Fuzzy search matching.

**Why it helps:** Power users navigate 10x faster without mouse. Reduces cognitive load with universal search. Pattern from Linear, Vercel, GitHub.

---

### **TASK-116: Agent Work Session Timer** (P1)
**Assigned:** Code-1 | **Due:** Feb 23 | **Effort:** 8 hours

Track actual time agents spend on tasks vs token estimates. Auto-start timer on task assignment. Calculate efficiency score (tokens/minute). Historical trends per agent.

**Why it helps:** Currently only tokens tracked, not real time. Blind spots for efficiency analysis. Time-per-task data optimizes agent assignments.

---

### **TASK-117: Token Burn Rate Visualization** (P2)
**Assigned:** Forge-1 | **Due:** Feb 24 | **Effort:** 4 hours

Show token usage velocity with projections. Daily/weekly burn rate. Projected depletion date. Alert thresholds (50%, 75%, 90%). Per-agent breakdown.

**Why it helps:** Current tracker shows history but not trajectory. Predict when limits hit. Proactive optimization before caps.

---

### **TASK-118: Auto-Generated Daily Standup Summary** (P2)
**Assigned:** Nexus | **Due:** Feb 21 | **Effort:** 3 hours

Auto-compile yesterday's activity into standup format. Deliver at 8:00 AM daily via Telegram. Tasks completed, in-progress, blockers, token summary.

**Why it helps:** Saves 10-15 min daily reviewing logs. Nothing missed. Consistent async update format.

---

### **TASK-119: GitHub Activity Feed Integration** (P2)
**Assigned:** Code-2 | **Due:** Feb 26 | **Effort:** 12 hours

Show commits, PRs, issues in dashboard. Recent commits feed. Open PRs with status. Commit-to-task linking. Deployment status from GitHub Actions.

**Why it helps:** Code activity currently invisible. Unified view of all work. Correlates commits with tasks.
